amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: SA 4937 (the instructions of the motion to refer) fell when cloture invoked on the motion to concur in the House amendment to S. 764 with an amendment SA 4935.
Amendment SA 4937 proposed by Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S4705) In the nature of a substitute.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4937 proposed by Senator McConnell.
